name: furni-store-monorepo
description: FurniStore - E-commerce platform with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.build: cd furni-store && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:frontend: cd furni-store && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: cd server && npm install && node server.js
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd furni-store && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run dev"
